attributes.action: Allow NHS pcr/antigen covid 19 tests to be accepted as proof of covid 19 status.
attributes.additional_details: Can the government allow the NHS PCR/ANTIGEN TEST to be accepted as legal proof of covid 19 status .
attributes.background: Allow the pcr/antigen nhs test to be accepted as legal proof of covid 19  status .

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure what you'd like to be covered by "legal proof of covid 19 status" 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586691
